recipe.title: Sample Chocolate Chip Cookies
recipe.ingredients: 2 cups flour, 1 cup sugar, 1/2 cup butter, 2 eggs, 1 cup chocolate chips
recipe.steps: 1. Preheat oven to 375Â°F 2. Mix dry ingredients 3. Cream butter and sugar 4. Add eggs and mix 5. Fold in chocolate chips 6. Bake for 10-12 minutes

recipe.title: Sample Spaghetti Carbonara
recipe.ingredients: 1 lb spaghetti, 4 eggs, 1 cup parmesan cheese, 6 slices bacon, black pepper
recipe.steps: 1. Cook spaghetti according to package directions 2. Cook bacon until crispy 3. Mix eggs and cheese 4. Toss hot pasta with bacon 5. Add egg mixture and toss quickly 6. Season with black pepper
